packageName.label: Base Package Name
packageName.description: The base package name must be a common package for the module, and the generation path will be searched based on this package name.

className.label: Generated Class Name
className.description: Will be used for entity class name and other layer prefixes

collectionName.label: Collection Name
collectionName.description: Generated MongoDB collection name, leave blank for camelCase class name

moduleEntity.label: Entity Module
moduleEntity.description: Target module for entity class generation
moduleEntity.placeholder: Enter the entity module folder name

moduleRepository.label: Repository Module
moduleRepository.description: Target module for repository class generation
moduleRepository.placeholder: Enter the repository module folder name

moduleService.label: Service Module
moduleService.description: Target module for service class generation
moduleService.placeholder: Enter the service module folder name

moduleServiceImpl.label: Implementation Module
moduleServiceImpl.description: Target module for implementation class generation
moduleServiceImpl.placeholder: Enter the implementation module folder name

packageEntity.label: Entity Package Suffix
packageEntity.description: Suffix for entity class package generation

packageRepository.label: Repository Package Suffix
packageRepository.description: Suffix for repository class package generation

packageService.label: Service Package Suffix
packageService.description: Suffix for service class package generation

packageServiceImpl.label: Implementation Package Suffix
packageServiceImpl.description: Suffix for implementation class package generation

outputDir.label: Output Target Folder
outputDir.description: Do not modify if you do not understand
